channel.title: cross building Kicksecure arm64 on Kicksecure amd64
channel.description:
Quick an easy way to cross build Kicksecure Xfce on `amd64` (Intel / AMD) for `arm64`.
With git tag `15.0.1.7.4-developers-only`
> sudo -E ./whonix_build --build --flavor kicksecure-xfce --target raw --remote-derivative-packages true --repo true --arch arm64
(`--remote-derivative-packages true`: https://forums.whonix.org/t/whonix-build-script-now-optionally-supports-installing-packages-from-whonix-remote-repository-rather-than-building-packages-locally/8107 - Optional. Not yet tested without. Will post an update once that is done.)
Build complete but did not test boot.
